title: News.news4.title
detail: Don't miss the latest FREE cross-arts theatre performance produced by STARLIGHT, taking place on May 11, 2024 at Innis Town Hall in Innis College, University of Toronto.

"The Art of FAREWELL MY CONCUBINE" 《霸王別姬 聲•色•藝》is a cross-arts production that includes Chinese music and Cantonese Opera. The performance aims to present the story of FAREWELL MY CONCUBINE in different Chinese art forms to the audience.

A group of students from STARLIGHT, will perform Nanyin (南音), also known as "southern tunes." Nanyin is a narrative song art presented in the Cantonese vernacular that was a popular form of entertainment in Hong Kong during the early 20th century. Today, Nanyin is blended into Cantonese opera and Cantonese operatic songs as part of their singing elements.

STARLIGHT is also thrilled to have Wen Zhao (趙文欣) in this event. Wen Zhao is an internationally recognized pipa virtuoso who combines eastern and western classical traditions in her music-making. Zhao was born in Beijing, China, and advanced her studies with pipa master Wang Fan Di at Beijing Normal University and subsequently at the University of London, becoming the first qualified Chinese music instructor in the United Kingdom. Since coming to Toronto in 1997, she has continued to pursue her career as an educator and performer on the world music stage. Zhao will perform "Conqueror Xiangyu Takes Off His Armour," a Pipa music piece that depicts the dreary and tragic scene of Xiang Yu taking off his armour after his defeat.
• Nanyin - "Farewell My Concubine" 《霸王別虞姬》
• Pipa Solo - "Conqueror Xiangyu Takes Off His Armour" 《霸王卸甲》 by Wen Zhao (on behalf of the Ontario Chinese Orchestra)
• Cantonese Opera - "Farewell My Concubine" 《霸王別姬》
Produced by STARLIGHT CHINESE OPERA PERFORMING ARTS CENTRE
Supported by UNIVERSITY OF TORONTO & RICHARD CHARLES LEE CANADA-HONG KONG LIBRARY

title: News.news6.title
detail: Hello, Montreal!

Starlight is excited to participate in the 2024 Canadian Comparative Literature Association Annual Conference, invited by York University. This Saturday, June 15, we will perform at the University of Montreal at 3:30 pm. The discussion topic will be "Exploring New Tunes and Old Rhymes in Chinese Opera: A Preliminary Study". The event is open to the public and co-chaired by Dr. Jessica Tsui-yan Li & Dr. Jack Hang-tat Leong. We hope to see new faces in Montreal at this commendable chance.
寶新聲很榮幸受到約克大學的邀請參加2024 Canadian Comparative Literature Association Annual Conference。我們將在蒙特婁大學(University of Montreal)演出。演出資訊如上，我們期待看到新面孔把握這個難得的機會欣賞粵劇及京劇演出，一同度過這個難忘的週六。
See you at the venue!
bigTitle: Canadian Comparative Literature Association Annual Conference 2024 - Cantonese Opera Performance｜加國比較文學週年會議 2024 - 粵劇示範表演

title: News.news7.title
detail: Gather all those who are passionate about the performing arts!

The annual performance of Starlight, "Little Starlets Shine with Starlight 2024." is coming back! This year, the performance will take place at Markham Theatre on July 21, 2024, at 1:30 pm. This year's performance will be led by President Alice Chan, with the Starlets and a live band performing nine selected excerpts accompanied by professional musicians.

Little Starlets Shine with Starlight has been running since 2012, providing Starlight students (Starlets) with the opportunity to showcase their skills and knowledge in Cantonese Opera. The program not only nurtures their passion for learning but also allows them to shine on stage. Furthermore, the local audience will have the chance to witness and appreciate the exceptional performance, contributing to future audience market growth.
To purchase tickets, please contact us via WhatsApp at +1 (647)887-1393 or email us at ticket@starlightopera.com.
寶新聲每年一度的匯演「聲輝戲曲耀梨園」今年將於 2024 年 7 月 21 日下午 1:30 在萬錦劇院舉行。今年的演出由導師陳景英帶領，寶新聲學員將在專業樂師拍和下，為觀眾獻上九個折子戲選段。
「聲輝戲曲耀梨園」自2012年開始舉辦，為寶新聲學生提供實踐及展演粵劇技巧和知識的機會。該演出機會不僅能培養學生的學習熱情、在舞台上大放異彩，亦使加拿大的戲曲觀眾得以欣賞精彩、專業的本土製作。
如需購票，請透過 WhatsApp +1 (647)887-1393 聯絡我們，或發送電子郵件至ticket@starlightopera.com。

***STARLIGHT CHINESE OPERA PERFORMING ARTS CENTRE reserves the right to modify, suspend, or terminate the event and/or terms and conditions without prior notice. The decision of Starlight Chinese Opera Performing Arts Centre is final in case of disputes 寶新聲戲曲演藝中心保留一切修改、暫停或終止活動及/或條款和條件的權利，恕不另行通知。在爭議情況下，寶新聲戲曲演藝中心擁有最終決定權。
